demos.contract_text:
```plaintext
                         MARKETING AFFILIATE AGREEMENT

This Marketing Affiliate Agreement (hereinafter referred to as the "Agreement") is made and entered into as of 05/08/2014, by and between SEATTLE SOFTWARE DEVELOPERS, Inc., a corporation duly incorporated under the laws of the State of Nevada, with its principal office at [Address], (hereinafter referred to as the "Developer"), and PELICAN DELIVERS INC., a corporation duly incorporated under the laws of [State], with its principal office at [Address], (hereinafter referred to as the "Client"), jointly referred to as the "Parties."

WHEREAS, the Developer provides software and related services for marketing purposes; and

WHEREAS, the Client desires to engage the Developer to provide such services under the terms and conditions set forth herein;

NOW, THEREFORE, in consideration of the mutual covenants and agreements herein contained, the Parties hereby agree as follows:

1. **Term of Agreement**  
   This Agreement shall commence on the date first written above and shall continue in full force and effect until 12/31/2014, unless earlier terminated in accordance with the provisions hereof. Upon the conclusion of the initial term, this Agreement shall be subject to renewal automatically for additional periods of one year each unless either Party provides written notice of its intention not to renew at least thirty (30) days prior to the expiration of the then-current term.

2. **Services Provided**  
   The Developer agrees to provide the Client with marketing and software development services as delineated in Exhibit A, attached hereto and incorporated by reference.

3. **Compensation**  
   The Client agrees to compensate the Developer in the amount and manner stipulated in Exhibit B, attached hereto and incorporated by reference.

4. **Termination**  
   Either Party may terminate this Agreement before its expiration date upon giving thirty (30) days written notice if the other Party breaches any material term or condition of this Agreement and such breach remains uncured after fifteen (15) days of receipt of written notice specifying the breach.

5. **Confidentiality**  
   The Parties agree to maintain confidentiality of any proprietary information received from the other Party and shall not disclose such information to any third parties without the prior written consent of the disclosing Party.

6. **Limitation of Liability**  
   In no event shall either Party be liable to the other for any consequential, incidental, indirect, or special damages, including lost revenues or profits, regardless of the form of action or theory of recovery, even if such Party has been advised of the possibility of such damages.

7. **Governing Law**  
   This Agreement and any disputes arising hereunder shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the State of Nevada, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.

8. **Amendments and Waivers**  
   No amendment, modification, or waiver of any provision of this Agreement shall be effective unless made in writing and signed by both Parties.

9. **Entire Agreement**  
   This Agreement constitutes the entire agreement between the Parties with respect to the subject matter hereof and supersedes all prior negotiations, agreements, and understandings, whether written or oral.

IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the Parties have executed this Agreement as of the date first above written.

SEATTLE SOFTWARE DEVELOPERS, Inc.

By: _________________________________  
Name: [Name]  
Title: [Title]  

PELICAN DELIVERS INC.

By: _________________________________  
Name: [Name]  
Title: [Title]  
```
demos.reasoning: I scanned the agreement for the key clauses. The opening paragraph lists the parties and their legal designations, which provides the names for the “parties” field. The phrase “made and entered into as of 05/08/2014” gives the agreement date, and the same date is repeated as the commencement date in section 1, giving the effective date. Section 1 also states the agreement will continue until 12/31/2014, so that is the expiration date. The renewal clause specifies “additional periods of one year each,” which I translated into a renewal term of 1 year. The notice requirement for non‑renewal is “at least thirty (30) days prior to the expiration of the then-current term,” yielding a 30‑day notice period. Finally, the governing law clause cites the State of Nevada. All dates are already in US format, so no conversion is necessary.
demos.answer: {"parties":"SEATTLE SOFTWARE DEVELOPERS, Inc.; PELICAN DELIVERS INC.","agreement_date":"5/8/14","effective_date":"5/8/14","expiration_date":"12/31/14","renewal_term":"1 year","notice_period":"30 days","governing_law":"Nevada"}
demos.parties_quote: "SEATTLE SOFTWARE DEVELOPERS, Inc., a corporation duly incorporated under the laws of the State of Nevada, with its principal office at [Address], (hereinafter referred to as the "Developer"), and PELICAN DELIVERS INC., a corporation duly incorporated under the laws of [State], with its principal office at [Address], (hereinafter referred to as the "Client")"
demos.parties_reasoning: The parties are identified in the preamble of the agreement where each entity is described with its legal form and jurisdiction. The quoted sentence clearly names both SEATTLE SOFTWARE DEVELOPERS, Inc. and PELICAN DELIVERS INC., making it the source for the parties field.

demos.contract_text:
**RENTAL AGREEMENT**

**THIS RENTAL AGREEMENT** is made and entered into on Aug 22, '05 (the "Agreement Date") by and between SEATTLE SOFTWARE DEVELOPERS, Inc., a corporation organized under the laws of the State of Washington, U.S.A. (hereinafter referred to as "Developer") and PELICAN DELIVERS INC., a corporation organized under the laws of the State of Delaware, U.S.A. (hereinafter referred to as "Client").

**1. EFFECTIVE DATE AND TERM**  
This Agreement shall become effective as of Aug 22, '05 ("Effective Date") and shall remain in full force and effect until Aug 22, '10 ("Expiration Date"), unless terminated earlier in accordance with the provisions herein stated.

**2. RENEWAL TERM**  
Upon expiration of the initial term as described in this Agreement, this contract may continue in effect for a successive period of three years should either party provide written notice of intent to renew at least 60 days prior to the end of any term hereof, unless properly terminated in accordance with Clause 5.

**3. GOVERNING LAW**  
This Agreement shall be governed by, construed, and enforced in accordance with the laws of England and Wales.

**4. NON-COMPETE CLAUSE**  
During the Term of this Agreement, including any extensions, the Client agrees not to engage or participate, directly or indirectly, in any business or activity that competes with the Developer's business. This restriction shall apply globally and during the term of the engagement as well as for a period of one year following the termination of this Agreement.

**5. TERMINATION**  
This Agreement may be terminated prior to the Expiration Date by either party upon providing no less than 60 days written notice of termination to the other party. Upon termination, Developer shall cease all work for Client and provide a detailed account of all deliverables up to the termination date.

**6. GENERAL PROVISIONS**  
6.1. **Notices** - All notices required or permitted under this Agreement shall be in writing and deemed duly served when personally delivered, sent via registered mail, or emailed to the respective party's addresses set forth herein.

6.2. **Severability** - Should any provision of this Agreement be found invalid or unenforceable by a court of competent jurisdiction, the same shall not affect other provisions of this Agreement, which shall remain in full force and effect.

6.3. **Entire Agreement** - This Agreement constitutes the entire understanding between the parties concerning the subject matter hereof and supersedes any prior agreements, written or oral, relating to said subject matter. Any amendments hereto must be in writing and signed by both parties.

**IN WITNESS WHEREOF**, the parties hereto have executed this Agreement as of the date first written above.

**DEVELOPER:**  
_SEATTLE SOFTWARE DEVELOPERS, Inc._  

By: ___________________________  
Name: _________________________  
Title: _________________________  
Date: Aug 22, '05  

**CLIENT:**  
_PELICAN DELIVERS INC._  

By: ___________________________  
Name: _________________________  
Title: _________________________  
Date: Aug 22, '05  

(End of Agreement)
demos.reasoning: The contract begins with a preamble that names the parties: SEATTLE SOFTWARE DEVELOPERS, Inc. and PELICAN DELIVERS INC., each with a designation (“Developer” and “Client”). The agreement date is stated as Aug 22, '05, which translates to 8/22/05. The effective date is the same, and the expiration date is Aug 22, '10, or 8/22/10. Clause 2 provides a renewal term of a successive period of three years, and Clause 5 specifies a 60‑day written notice for termination. Clause 3 lists governing law as “England and Wales.” These details are extracted directly from the text; the parties quote is taken from the opening sentence of the agreement.

(hereinafter referred to as "Developer") and PELICAN DELIVERS INC., a corporation organized under the laws of the State of Delaware, U.S.A. (hereinafter referred to as "Client")."

demos.contract_text:
DEVELOPMENT AGREEMENT

This DEVELOPMENT AGREEMENT (“Agreement”) is made and entered into as of the 30th day of September, 2019 (“Agreement Date”), by and between SEATTLE SOFTWARE DEVELOPERS, Inc., a corporation existing under the laws of the State of Washington with its principal place of business at [address] (“Developer”), and PELICAN DELIVERS INC., a corporation existing under the laws of the State of [state] with its principal place of business at [address] (“Client”).

WHEREAS, Client desires to engage Developer to provide certain development services; and

WHEREAS, Developer agrees to provide such services to Client under the terms and conditions set forth herein;

NOW, THEREFORE, in consideration of the mutual covenants and promises contained herein, the receipt and sufficiency of which are hereby acknowledged, the parties agree as follows:

1. **Effective Date**

   This Agreement shall be effective as of the 30th day of September, 2019 (“Effective Date”).

2. **Services**

   Developer agrees to provide the development services described in Exhibit A attached hereto and made a part hereof (the “Services”).

3. **Compensation**

   Client shall pay Developer the fees and expenses as set forth in Exhibit B attached hereto.

4. **Exclusivity**

   During the term of this Agreement, Developer shall be the exclusive provider of development services to Client with respect to the projects outlined in Exhibit A.

5. **Term and Renewal**

   The initial term of this Agreement shall commence on the Effective Date. Upon expiration of the initial term, the Agreement shall automatically renew for successive one-year periods unless either party provides the other with written notice of termination at least thirty (30) days prior to the end of the then-current term.

6. **Termination**

   Either party may terminate this Agreement upon thirty (30) days’ written notice to the other party, with or without cause.

7. **Governing Law**

   This Agreement shall be governed by, and construed in accordance with, the laws of the State of New York, without regard to its conflict of laws principles.

8. **Notices**

   Any notice required or permitted under this Agreement shall be deemed sufficiently given only if sent in writing by certified mail, return receipt requested, or by a nationally recognized overnight delivery service, to the addresses stated above.

9. **Entire Agreement**

   This Agreement constitutes the entire agreement between the parties regarding the subject matter hereof and supersedes all prior negotiations, agreements, or representations, whether oral or written, regarding its subject matter.

10. **Amendment**

    This Agreement may be amended only by a written document signed by both parties.

IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the parties hereto have executed this Agreement as of the Agreement Date first above written.

---

**SEATTLE SOFTWARE DEVELOPERS, Inc.**
   
By: ______________________________  
Name: ____________________________  
Title: ___________________________  

**PELICAN DELIVERS INC.**

By: ______________________________  
Name: ____________________________  
Title: ___________________________
demos.reasoning: The contract text identifies the parties in the first paragraph: “SEATTLE SOFTWARE DEVELOPERS, Inc.” and “PELICAN DELIVERS INC.”. The agreement date is given as “as of the 30th day of September, 2019” in the introductory paragraph, and the Effective Date is stated in Section 1 as the same day. The Term section indicates that the initial term begins on the Effective Date and renews automatically for successive one‑year periods, but no specific expiration date is provided, so we record “N/A.” The renewal clause specifies successive 1‑year periods, and the notice requirement for termination is “at least thirty (30) days prior to the end of the then‑current term.” The Governing Law clause states the laws of the State of New York. All dates are converted to US format (M/D/YY).

demos.contract_text:
```plaintext
EXCLUSIVE LICENSE AND PRODUCT DEVELOPMENT AGREEMENT

This Exclusive License and Product Development Agreement (hereinafter referred to as "Agreement") is entered into and made effective as of Sep 2, '19 ("Effective Date"), by and between Eton Pharmaceuticals, Inc. (hereafter "ETON"), a corporation organized under the laws of the State of Delaware, with principal offices at [address], and Aucta Pharmaceuticals, Inc. (hereafter "Aucta"), a corporation organized under the laws of the State of Delaware, with principal offices at [address]. Collectively, the aforementioned entities may be referred to herein as the "Parties," and individually as a "Party."

WHEREAS, Aucta desires to grant ETON an exclusive license to develop, market, and distribute certain pharmaceutical products; and

WHEREAS, ETON is desirous of obtaining such an exclusive license from Aucta;

NOW, THEREFORE, in consideration of the mutual covenants and agreements set forth herein, the Parties agree as follows:

1. **Grant of License**  
   Aucta hereby grants to ETON an exclusive, perpetual license to develop, market, and distribute the products set forth in Exhibit A attached hereto (the "Products").

2. **Term and Renewal**  
   This Agreement shall commence on the Effective Date, notwithstanding the Agreement Date of Jun 12, '19, and shall continue indefinitely. Upon two years after each anniversary of the Effective Date, this Agreement shall automatically renew for successive two-year periods unless either Party provides written notice of termination at least thirty (30) days prior to the expiration of the then-current term.

3. **Exclusivity**  
   During the term of this Agreement, and any renewal terms, Aucta agrees that it will not grant any similar licenses to any other party that may compromise the exclusivity granted herein.

4. **Non-Compete**  
   Throughout the duration of this Agreement and for a period of two years post-termination, Aucta shall not engage, directly or indirectly, in any business or activities that compete with the Products as defined in this Agreement.

5. **Governing Law**  
   This Agreement shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the State of Delaware, without regard to its conflict of laws principles.

6. **Notice**  
   Any notice required or permitted under this Agreement shall be in writing and shall be deemed effectively given upon personal delivery or three days following deposit into the United States mail, registered or certified, postage prepaid, addressed to the receiving Party at the address listed above or such other address as such Party may designate in writing.

IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the Parties hereto have executed this Agreement as of the Effective Date.

Eton Pharmaceuticals, Inc.                Aucta Pharmaceuticals, Inc.

By: ___________________________          By: ___________________________

Name: _________________________          Name: _________________________

Title: __________________________        Title: __________________________

Date: _________________________          Date: _________________________
```
demos.reasoning: I identified the parties from the opening paragraph where the agreement specifies the entities: "Eton Pharmaceuticals, Inc. (hereafter 'ETON')" and "Aucta Pharmaceuticals, Inc. (hereafter 'Aucta')". The agreement date is explicitly mentioned as "Agreement Date of Jun 12, '19" and the effective date is stated as "effective as of Sep 2, '19". The contract is described as continuing indefinitely with successive two‑year renewal periods, so the expiration date is “perpetual”. The renewal term is two years and the required notice for termination is thirty (30) days. Governing law is set to the State of Delaware. All dates are converted to the US MM/DD/YY format.

(hereafter “Aucta”), a corporation organized under the laws of the State of Delaware, with principal offices at [address].

signature.instructions:
You are a legal contract analyzer. Extract key clauses from the contract text.

STRICT DATE RULE: All output dates MUST be in US format (Month/Day/Year). 
If you see Day.Month.Year (e.g. 13.01.2019), convert it to 01/13/19.

fields.description:
JSON object with the following fields:
        - parties: Names of parties (e.g. "Company A" and "Company B").
        - agreement_date: Date agreement was made (M/D/YY).
        - effective_date: Date contract becomes effective (M/D/YY).
        - expiration_date: Date contract expires (M/D/YY) or "perpetual".
        - renewal_term: Renewal terms (e.g. "3 years", "successive 1 year", "perpetual", "2 years").
        - notice_period: Notice period required to terminate renewal (number of days or months) (e.g. "90 days", "6 months").
        - governing_law: Jurisdiction (e.g. "New York", "Ontario, Canada").

        Use "N/A" if a field is not found.
